title: Design IoT Sensor Network Architecture
description: Create the architecture for the network of IoT sensors that will monitor industrial processes in real-time.

title: Define Sensor Specifications
description: Specify the required capabilities and limitations for each type of sensor used in the network.

title: Develop Real-Time Monitoring System
description: Create the software system that will collect and process data from the sensors in real-time.

title: Implement Data Analytics Module
description: Develop a module to analyze the data collected by the monitoring system and generate insights for process improvement.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create the interface for displaying sensor data and analytics insights to users.

title: Test Sensor Network and Software
description: Conduct thorough testing of the sensor network, sensors, and software system to ensure proper functionality.

title: Secure IoT Sensor Network and Software
description: Implement security measures to protect the sensor network, sensors, and software system from potential threats.

title: Document Project Design and Implementation
description: Write comprehensive documentation detailing the project design, implementation process, and usage instructions.
dependencies: Secure IoT Sensor Network and Software
